dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Education, level unspecified
Clarifications: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Education, level unspecified
Clarifications: Education sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to education ministries, administration and management systems; institution capacity building and advice; school management and governance; curriculum and materials development; unspecified education activities.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Education, level unspecified
Clarifications: Educational buildings, equipment, materials; subsidiary services to education (boarding facilities, staff housing); language training; colloquia, seminars, lectures, etc.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Education, level unspecified
Clarifications: Teacher education (where the level of education is unspecified); in-service and pre-service training; materials development.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Education, level unspecified
Clarifications: Research and studies on education effectiveness, relevance and quality; systematic evaluation and monitoring.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Basic education
Clarifications: Formal and non-formal primary education for children; all elementary and first cycle systematic instruction; provision of learning materials.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Basic education
description: Basic life skills for youth and adults
Clarifications: Formal and non-formal education for basic life skills for young people and adults (adults education); literacy and numeracy training.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Basic education
Clarifications: Formal and non-formal education for basic life skills for young people.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Basic education
Clarifications: Formal primary education for adults.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Basic education
Clarifications: Formal and non-formal pre-school education.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Secondary education
Clarifications: Second cycle systematic instruction at both junior and senior levels.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Secondary education
Clarifications: Second cycle systematic instruction at junior level.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Secondary education
Clarifications: Second cycle systematic instruction at senior level.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Secondary education
Clarifications: Elementary vocational training and secondary level technical education; on-the job training; apprenticeships; including informal vocational training.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Post-secondary education
Clarifications: Degree and diploma programmes at universities, colleges and polytechnics; scholarships.

dac2.Name: EDUCATION
dac.Name: Post-secondary education
Clarifications: Professional-level vocational training programmes and in-service training.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Health, general
Clarifications: Health sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to health ministries, public health administration; institution capacity building and advice; medical insurance programmes; unspecified health activities.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Health, general
Clarifications: Medical education and training for tertiary level services.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Health, general
Clarifications: General medical research (excluding basic health research).

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Health, general
Clarifications: Laboratories, specialised clinics and hospitals (including equipment and supplies); ambulances; dental services; mental health care; medical rehabilitation; control of non-infectious diseases; drug and substance abuse control [excluding narcotics traffic control (16063)].

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Basic and primary health care programmes; paramedical and nursing care programmes; supply of drugs, medicines and vaccines related to basic health care.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: District-level hospitals, clinics and dispensaries and related medical equipment; excluding specialised hospitals and clinics (12191).

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Direct feeding programmes (maternal feeding, breastfeeding and weaning foods, child feeding, school feeding); determination of micro-nutrient deficiencies; provision of vitamin A, iodine, iron etc.; monitoring of nutritional status; nutrition and food hygiene education; household food security.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Immunisation; prevention and control of infectious and parasite diseases, except malaria (12262), tuberculosis (12263), HIV/AIDS and other STDs (13040). It includes diarrheal diseases, vector-borne diseases (e.g. river blindness and guinea worm), viral diseases, mycosis, helminthiasis, zoonosis, diseases by other bacteria and viruses, pediculosis, etc.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Information, education and training of the population for improving health knowledge and practices; public health and awareness campaigns; promotion of improved personal hygiene practices, including use of sanitation facilities and handwashing with soap.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Prevention and control of malaria.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Immunisation, prevention and control of tuberculosis.

dac2.Name: HEALTH
dac.Name: Basic health
Clarifications: Training of health staff for basic health care services.

dac2.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
dac.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
description: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH

dac2.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
dac.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
Clarifications: Population/development policies; census work, vital registration; migration data; demographic research/analysis; reproductive health research; unspecified population activities.

dac2.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
dac.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
Clarifications: Promotion of reproductive health; prenatal and postnatal care including delivery; prevention and treatment of infertility; prevention and management of consequences of abortion; safe motherhood activities.

dac2.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
dac.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
Clarifications: Family planning services including counselling; information, education and communication (IEC) activities; delivery of contraceptives; capacity building and training.

dac2.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
dac.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
Clarifications: All activities related to sexually transmitted diseases and HIV/AIDS control e.g. information, education and communication; testing; prevention; treatment, care.

dac2.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
dac.Name: POPULATION POLICIES/ PROGRAMMES AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
description: Personnel development for population and reproductive health
Clarifications: Education and training of health staff for population and reproductive health care services.

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
description: Water sector policy and administrative management
Clarifications: Water sector policy and governance, including legislation, regulation, planning and management as well as transboundary management of water; institutional capacity development; activities supporting the Integrated Water Resource Management approach (IWRM: see box below).

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Collection and usage of quantitative and qualitative data on water resources; creation and sharing of water knowledge; conservation and rehabilitation of inland surface waters (rivers, lakes etc.), ground water and coastal waters; prevention of water contamination.

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
description: Water supply and sanitation - large systems
Clarifications: Programmes where components according to 14021 and 14022 cannot be identified. When components are known, they should individually be reported under their respective purpose codes: water supply (14021), sanitation (14022), and hygiene (12261).

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Potable water treatment plants; intake works; storage; water supply pumping stations; large scale transmission / conveyance and distribution systems.

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Large scale sewerage including trunk sewers and sewage pumping stations; domestic and industrial waste water treatment plants.

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
description: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation
Clarifications: Programmes where components according to 14031 and 14032 cannot be identified. When components are known, they should individually be reported under their respective purpose codes: water supply (14031), sanitation (14032), and hygiene (12261).

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Rural water supply schemes using handpumps, spring catchments, gravity-fed systems, rainwater collection and fog harvesting, storage tanks, small distribution systems typically with shared connections/points of use. Urban schemes using handpumps and local neighbourhood networks including those with shared connections.

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Latrines, on-site disposal and alternative sanitation systems, including the promotion of household and community investments in the construction of these facilities. (Use code 12261 for activities promoting improved personal hygiene practices.)

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Infrastructure-focused integrated river basin projects and related institutional activities; river flow control; dams and reservoirs [excluding dams primarily for irrigation (31140) and hydropower (23065) and activities related to river transport (21040)].

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
Clarifications: Municipal and industrial solid waste management, including hazardous and toxic waste; collection, disposal and treatment; landfill areas; composting and reuse.

dac2.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
dac.Name: WATER AND SANITATION
description: Education and training in water supply and sanitation
Clarifications: Education and training for sector professionals and service providers.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: GOVERNMENT AND CIVIL SOCIETY
Clarifications: Includes assistance to strengthen the administrative apparatus and government.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
description: Public sector policy and administrative management
Clarifications: Institution-building assistance to strengthen core public sector management systems and capacities. This includes macro-economic and other policy management, co-ordination, planning and reform; human resource management; organisational development; civil service reform; e-government; development planning, monitoring and evaluation; support to ministries involved in aid co-ordination; other ministries and government departments when sector cannot be specified. (Use specific sector codes for development of systems and capacities in sector ministries.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Administration of external affairs and services.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation of diplomatic and consular missions stationed abroad or at offices of international organisations.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
description: Administration of developing countries' foreign aid
Clarifications: Support to administration of developing countries' foreign aid (including triangular and south-south cooperation).

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Administration and operation of the civil service including policies, procedures and regulations.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Administration and operation of centralised supply and purchasing services.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Maintenance and storage of government records and archives, operation of government-owned or occupied buildings, central motor vehicle pools, government-operated printing offices, centralised computer and data processing services, etc.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation or support of institutions providing national monitoring and evaluation.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Macroeconomic policy development and implementation.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation or support of institutions dealing with weather forecasting.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation or support of institutions dealing with national standards development. (Use code 16062 for statistical capacity-building.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Administration, operation or support of executive office. Includes office of the chief executive at all levels of government (monarch, governor-general, president, prime minister, governor, mayor, etc.).

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Fiscal policy and planning; support to ministries of finance; strengthening financial and managerial accountability; public expenditure management; improving financial management systems; budget drafting; inter-governmental fiscal relations, public audit, public debt. (Use code 15114 for domestic revenue mobilisation and code 33120 for customs).

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation of the budget office and planning as part of the budget process.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation of the accounting and audit services.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Management of public debt and foreign aid received (in the partner country). For reporting on debt reorganisation, use codes 600xx.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
description: Decentralisation and support to subnational government
Clarifications: Decentralisation processes (including political, administrative and fiscal dimensions); intergovernmental relations and federalism; strengthening departments of regional and local government, regional and local authorities and their national associations. (Use specific sector codes for decentralisation of sector management and services.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Financial transfers to local government; support to institutions managing such transfers. (Use specific sector codes for sector-related transfers.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Transfers to non sector-specific autonomous bodies or state-owned enterprises outside of local government finance; support to institutions managing such transfers. (Use specific sector codes for sector-related transfers.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Decentralisation processes (including political, administrative and fiscal dimensions); intergovernmental relations and federalism; strengthening local authorities.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Specialised organisations, institutions and frameworks for the prevention of and combat against corruption, bribery, money- laundering and other aspects of organised crime, with or without law enforcement powers, e.g. anti-corruption commissions and monitoring bodies, special investigation services, institutions and initiatives of integrity and ethics oversight, specialised NGOs, other civil society and citizens’ organisations directly concerned with corruption.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Support to domestic revenue mobilisation/tax policy, analysis and administration as well as non-tax public revenue, which includes work with ministries of finance, line ministries, revenue authorities or other local, regional or national public bodies. (Use code 16010 for social security and other social protection.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Operation of the inland revenue authority.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Non-tax public revenue, which includes line ministries, revenue authorities or other local, regional or national public bodies.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Support to institutions, systems and procedures of the justice sector, both formal and informal; support to ministries of justice, the interior and home affairs; judges and courts; legal drafting services; bar and lawyers associations; professional legal education; maintenance of law and order and public safety; border management; law enforcement agencies, police, prisons and their supervision; ombudsmen; alternative dispute resolution, arbitration and mediation; legal aid and counsel; traditional, indigenous and paralegal practices that fall outside the formal legal system. Measures that support the improvement of legal frameworks, constitutions, laws and regulations; legislative and constitutional drafting and review; legal reform; integration of formal and informal systems of law. Public legal education; dissemination of information on entitlements and remedies for injustice; awareness campaigns. (Use codes 152xx for activities that are primarily aimed at supporting security system reform or undertaken in connection with post-conflict and peace building activities.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
description: Justice, law and order policy, planning and administration
Clarifications: Judicial law and order sectors; policy development within ministries of justice or equivalents.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Police affairs and services.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Fire-prevention and fire-fighting affairs and services.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Civil and criminal law courts and the judicial system, including enforcement of fines and legal settlements imposed by the courts and operation of parole and probation systems.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Independent service representing the interests of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of unfair treatment or maladministration.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Immigration affairs and services, including alien registration, issuing work and travel documents to immigrants.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Support to the exercise of democracy and diverse forms of participation of citizens beyond elections (15151); direct democracy instruments such as referenda and citizens’ initiatives; support to organisations to represent and advocate for their members, to monitor, engage and hold governments to account, and to help citizens learn to act in the public sphere; curricula and teaching for civic education at various levels. (This purpose code is restricted to activities targeting governance issues. When assistance to civil society is for non-governance purposes use other appropriate purpose codes.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Electoral management bodies and processes, election observation, voters' education. (Use code 15230 when in the context of an international peacekeeping operation).

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Assistance to strengthen key functions of legislatures/ parliaments including subnational assemblies and councils (representation; oversight; legislation), such as improving the capacity of legislative bodies, improving legislatures’ committees and administrative procedures,; research and information management systems; providing training programmes for legislators and support personnel. Assistance to political parties and strengthening of party systems.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
description: Media and free flow of information
Clarifications: Activities that support free and uncensored flow of information on public issues; activities that increase the editorial and technical skills and the integrity of the print and broadcast media, e.g. training of journalists. (Use codes 22010-22040 for provision of equipment and capital assistance to media.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications:
Measures to support specialised official human rights institutions and mechanisms at universal, regional, national and local levels in their statutory roles to promote and protect civil and political, economic, social and cultural rights as defined in international conventions and covenants; translation of international human rights commitments into national legislation; reporting and follow-up; human rights dialogue.
Human rights defenders and human rights NGOs; human rights advocacy, activism, mobilisation; awareness raising and public human rights education.
Human rights programming targeting specific groups, e.g. children, persons with disabilities, migrants, ethnic, religious, linguistic and sexual minorities, indigenous people and those suffering from caste discrimination, victims of trafficking, victims of torture.
(Use code 15230 when in the context of a peacekeeping operation.)
(As from 2017 reporting on 2016 flows, use code 15180 for ending violence against women and girls.)

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
Clarifications: Support for institutions and organisations (governmental and non-governmental) working for gender equality and women’s empowerment.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Government and civil society, general
description: Ending violence against women and girls
Clarifications:
Support to programmes designed to prevent and eliminate all forms of violence against women and girls/gender-based violence. This encompasses a broad range of forms of physical, sexual and psychological violence including but not limited to: intimate partner violence (domestic violence); sexual violence; female genital mutilation/cutting (FGM/C); child, early and forced marriage; acid throwing; honour killings; and trafficking of women and girls.
Prevention activities may include efforts to empower women and girls; change attitudes, norms and behaviour; adopt and enact legal reforms; and strengthen implementation of laws and policies on ending violence against women and girls, including through strengthening institutional capacity.
Interventions to respond to violence against women and girls/gender-based violence may include expanding access to services including legal assistance, psychosocial counselling and health care; training personnel to respond more effectively to the needs of survivors; and ensuring investigation, prosecution and punishment of perpetrators of violence.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
description: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Clarifications: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 76-81 of the Directives.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Clarifications: Technical co-operation provided to parliament, government ministries, law enforcement agencies and the judiciary to assist review and reform of the security system to improve democratic governance and civilian control; technical co-operation provided to government to improve civilian oversight and democratic control of budgeting, management, accountability and auditing of security expenditure, including military budgets, as part of a public expenditure management programme; assistance to civil society to enhance its competence and capacity to scrutinise the security system so that it is managed in accordance with democratic norms and principles of accountability, transparency and good governance. [Other than in the context of an international peacekeeping operation (15230).]

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
description: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Clarifications: Support for civilian activities related to peace building, conflict prevention and resolution, including capacity building, monitoring, dialogue and information exchange. Bilateral participation in international civilian peace missions such as those conducted by the UN Department of Political Affairs (UNDPA) or the European Union (European Security and Defence Policy), and contributions to civilian peace funds or commissions (e.g. Peacebuilding Commission, Peacebuilding thematic window of the MDG achievement fund etc.). The contributions can take the form of financing or provision of equipment or civilian or military personnel (e.g. for training civilians). (Use code 15230 for bilateral participation in international peacekeeping operations).

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Clarifications:
Bilateral participation in peacekeeping operations mandated or authorised by the United Nations (UN) through Security Council resolutions, and conducted by international organisations, e.g. UN, NATO, the European Union (Security and Defence Policy security-related operations), or regional groupings of developing countries.
Direct contributions to the UN Department for Peacekeeping Operations (UNDPKO) budget are excluded from bilateral ODA (they are reportable in part as multilateral ODA, see Annex 9).
The activities that can be reported as bilateral ODA under this code are limited to: human rights and election monitoring; reintegration of demobilised soldiers; rehabilitation of basic national infrastructure; monitoring or retraining of civil administrators and police forces; security sector reform and other rule of law-related activities; training in customs and border control procedures; advice or training in fiscal or macroeconomic stabilisation policy; repatriation and demobilisation of armed factions, and disposal of their weapons; explosive mine removal. The enforcement aspects of international peacekeeping operations are not reportable as ODA. ODA-eligible bilateral participation in peacekeeping operations can take the form of financing or provision of equipment or military or civilian personnel (e.g. police officers). The reportable cost is calculated as the excess over what the personnel and equipment would have cost to maintain had they not been assigned to take part in a peace operation. Costs for military contingents participating in UNDPKO peacekeeping operations are not reportable as ODA. International peacekeeping operations may include humanitarian-type activities (contributions to the form of equipment or personnel), as described in codes 7xxxx. These should be included under code 15230 if they are an integrated part of the activities above, otherwise they should be reported as humanitarian aid.NB: When using this code, indicate the name of the operation in the short description of the activity reported.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Clarifications: Reintegration of demobilised military personnel into the economy; conversion of production facilities from military to civilian outputs; technical co-operation to control, prevent and/or reduce the proliferation of small arms and light weapons (SALW) – see para. 80 of the Directives for definition of SALW activities covered. [Other than in the context of an international peacekeeping operation (15230) or child soldiers (15261)].

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
description: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
Clarifications: All activities related to land mines and explosive remnants of war which have benefits to developing countries as their main objective, including removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war, and stockpile destruction for developmental purposes [other than in the context of an international peacekeeping operation (15230)]; risk education and awareness raising; rehabilitation, reintegration and assistance to victims, and research and development on demining and clearance. Only activities for civilian purposes are ODA-eligible.

dac2.Name: GOV. AND CIVIL SOC.
dac.Name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Clarifications: Technical co-operation provided to government – and assistance to civil society organisations – to support and apply legislation designed to prevent the recruitment of child soldiers, and to demobilise, disarm, reintegrate, repatriate and resettle (DDR) child soldiers.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Social legislation and administration; institution capacity building and advice; social security and other social schemes; special programmes for the elderly, orphans, the disabled, street children; social dimensions of structural adjustment; unspecified social infrastructure and services, including consumer protection.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
description: Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Clarifications: Administration of overall social protection policies, plans, programmes and budgets including legislation, standards and statistics on social protection.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Social protection shemes in the form of cash or in-kind benefits to people unable to work due to sickness or injury.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Social protection schemes in the form of cash or in-kind benefits, including pensions, against the risks linked to old age.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Pension schemes for government personnel.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
description: Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
Clarifications: Social protection schemes in the form of cash or in-kind benefits to households with dependent children, including parental leave benefits.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Employment policy and planning; labour law; labour unions; institution capacity building and advice; support programmes for unemployed; employment creation and income generation programmes; occupational safety and health; combating child labour.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Housing sector policy, planning and programmes; excluding low-cost housing and slum clearance (16040).

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Including slum clearance.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
description: Multisector aid for basic social services
Clarifications: Basic social services are defined to include basic education, basic health, basic nutrition, population/reproductive health and basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Including libraries and museums.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Both in national statistical offices and any other government ministries.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: In-country and customs controls including training of the police; educational programmes and awareness campaigns to restrict narcotics traffic and in-country distribution 1.

dac2.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
dac.Name: OTHER SOCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES
Clarifications: Special programmes to address the consequences of HIV/AIDS, e.g. social, legal and economic assistance to people living with HIV/AIDS including food security and employment; support to vulnerable groups and children orphaned by HIV/AIDS; human rights of HIV/AIDS affected people.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Transport sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to transport ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified transport; activities that combine road, rail, water and/or air transport. Whenever possible, report transport of goods under the sector of the good being transported.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Administration of affairs and services concerning transport systems.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Administration of affairs and services concerning public transport.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Supervision and regulation of users, operations, construction and maintenance of transport systems (registration, licensing, inspection of equipment, operator skills and training; safety standards, franchises, tarriffs, levels of service, etc.).

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Road infrastructure, road vehicles; passenger road transport, motor passenger cars.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Construction or operation of feeder road transport systems and facilities.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Maintenance of feeder road transport systems and facilities.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Construction or operation of national road transport systems and facilities.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Maintenance of national road transport systems and facilities.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Rail infrastructure, rail equipment, locomotives, other rolling stock; including light rail (tram) and underground systems.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Harbours and docks, harbour guidance systems, ships and boats; river and other inland water transport, inland barges and vessels.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Airports, airport guidance systems, aeroplanes, aeroplane maintenance equipment.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
Clarifications: Whether or not related to transportation. Whenever possible, report storage projects under the sector of the resource being stored.

dac2.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
dac.Name: TRANSPORT AND STORAGE
description: Education and training in transport and storage

dac2.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
dac.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Clarifications: Communications sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; including postal services development; unspecified communications activities.

dac2.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
dac.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Clarifications: Development and operation of postal services.

dac2.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
dac.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Clarifications: Provision of information services.

dac2.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
dac.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Clarifications: Telephone networks, telecommunication satellites, earth stations.

dac2.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
dac.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Clarifications: Radio and TV links, equipment; newspapers; printing and publishing.

dac2.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
dac.Name: COMMUNICATIONS
Clarifications: Computer hardware and software; internet access; IT training. When sector cannot be specified.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
Clarifications: Categories 231 through 235 include both electric power plants and combined heat and power (CHP) plants. Heat-only plants, whatever the type of fuel, are reportable under category 236. Activities relating to fuelwood/charcoal production, energy manufacturing and natural resources extraction (including oil and gas pipelines) are reportable under categories 312, 321 et 322 respectively.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
description: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
Clarifications: Energy sector policy, planning; aid to energy ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified energy activities.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
description: Energy sector policy, planning and administration

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
Clarifications: Regulation of the energy sector, including wholesale and retail electricity provision.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
Clarifications: All levels of training not included elsewhere.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
Clarifications: Including general inventories, surveys.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, distribution and efficiency – general
Clarifications: All projects in support of energy demand reduction, e.g. building and industry upgrades, smart grids, metering and tariffs. Also includes efficient cook-stoves and biogas projects.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
description: Energy generation, renewable sources – multiple technologies
Clarifications: Renewable energy generation programmes that cannot be attributed to one single technology (codes 23220 through 23280 below). Fuelwood/charcoal production should be included under forestry 31261.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
Clarifications: Including energy generating river barges.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
Clarifications: Including photo-voltaic cells, solar thermal applications and solar heating.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
Clarifications: Wind energy for water lifting and electric power generation.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
Clarifications: Including ocean thermal energy conversion, tidal and wave power.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
Clarifications: Use of geothermal energy for generating electric power or directly as heat for agriculture, etc.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, renewable sources
Clarifications: Use of solids and liquids produced from biomass for direct power generation. Also includes biogases from anaerobic fermentation (e.g. landfill gas, sewage sludge gas, fermentation of energy crops and manure) and thermal processes (also known as syngas); waste-fired power plants making use of biodegradable municipal waste (household waste and waste from companies and public services that resembles household waste, collected at installations specifically designed for their disposal with recovery of combustible liquids, gases or heat). See code 23360 for non- renewable waste-fired power plants.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, non-renewable sources
Clarifications: Thermal power plants including when energy source cannot be determined; combined gas-coal power plants.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, non-renewable sources
Clarifications: Thermal electric power plants that use coal as the energy source.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, non-renewable sources
Clarifications: Thermal electric power plants that use fuel oil or diesel fuel as the energy source.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, non-renewable sources
Clarifications: Electric power plants that are fuelled by natural gas.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, non-renewable sources
description: Fossil fuel electric power plants with carbon capture and storage (CCS)
Clarifications: Fossil fuel electric power plants employing technologies to capture carbon dioxide emissions. CCS not related to power plants should be included under 41020. CCS activities are not reportable as ODA.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Energy generation, non-renewable sources
Clarifications: Electric power plants that use non-biodegradable industrial and municipal waste as the energy source.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Hybrid energy electric power plants
Clarifications: Electric power plants that make use of both non-renewable and renewable energy sources.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Nuclear energy electric power plants
Clarifications: Including nuclear safety.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Heating, cooling and energy distribution
Clarifications: Power plants which are designed to produce heat only.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Heating, cooling and energy distribution
Clarifications: Distribution of heat generated in a centralised location, or delivery of chilled water, for residential and commercial heating or cooling purposes.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Heating, cooling and energy distribution
Clarifications: Grid distribution from power source to end user; transmission lines. Also includes storage of energy to generate power (e.g. pumped hydro, batteries) and the extension of grid access, often to rural areas.

dac2.Name: ENERGY GENERATION, DISTRIBUTION AND EFFICIENCY
dac.Name: Heating, cooling and energy distribution
Clarifications: Delivery for use by ultimate consumer.

dac2.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
dac.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
Clarifications: Finance sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; financial markets and systems.

dac2.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
dac.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
Clarifications: Central banks.

dac2.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
dac.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
Clarifications: All formal sector financial intermediaries; credit lines; insurance, leasing, venture capital, etc. (except when focused on only one sector).

dac2.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
dac.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
Clarifications: Micro credit, savings and credit co-operatives etc.

dac2.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
dac.Name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
description: Education/training in banking and financial services

dac2.Name: BUSINESS AND OTHER SERVICES
dac.Name: BUSINESS AND OTHER SERVICES
Clarifications: Support to trade and business associations, chambers of commerce; legal and regulatory reform aimed at improving business and investment climate; private sector institution capacity building and advice; trade information; public-private sector networking including trade fairs; e-commerce. Where sector cannot be specified: general support to private sector enterprises (in particular, use code 32130 for enterprises in the industrial sector).

dac2.Name: BUSINESS AND OTHER SERVICES
dac.Name: BUSINESS AND OTHER SERVICES
Clarifications: When sector cannot be specified. Including general state enterprise restructuring or demonopolisation programmes; planning, programming, advice.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Agricultural sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to agricultural ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified agriculture.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Integrated projects; farm development.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Including soil degradation control; soil improvement; drainage of water logged areas; soil desalination; agricultural land surveys; land reclamation; erosion control, desertification control.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Irrigation, reservoirs, hydraulic structures, ground water exploitation for agricultural use.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Supply of seeds, fertilizers, agricultural machinery/equipment.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Including grains (wheat, rice, barley, maize, rye, oats, millet, sorghum); horticulture; vegetables; fruit and berries; other annual and perennial crops. [Use code 32161 for agro-industries.]

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Including sugar; coffee, cocoa, tea; oil seeds, nuts, kernels; fibre crops; tobacco; rubber. [Use code 32161 for agro-industries.]

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Animal husbandry; animal feed aid.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Including agricultural sector adjustment.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Projects to reduce illicit drug cultivation through other agricultural marketing and production opportunities (see code 43050 for non-agricultural alternative development).

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Non-formal training in agriculture.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Plant breeding, physiology, genetic resources, ecology, taxonomy, disease control, agricultural bio-technology; including livestock research (animal health, breeding and genetics, nutrition, physiology).

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Marketing policies & organisation; storage and transportation, creation of strategic reserves.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
description: Plant and post-harvest protection and pest control
Clarifications: Including integrated plant protection, biological plant protection activities, supply and management of agrochemicals, supply of pesticides, plant protection policy and legislation.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Financial intermediaries for the agricultural sector including credit schemes; crop insurance.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Including farmers’ organisations.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: AGRICULTURE
Clarifications: Animal health and management, genetic resources, feed resources.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FORESTRY
Clarifications: Forestry sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; forest surveys; unspecified forestry and agro-forestry activities.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FORESTRY
Clarifications: Afforestation for industrial and rural consumption; exploitation and utilisation; erosion control, desertification control; integrated forestry projects.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FORESTRY
Clarifications: Forestry development whose primary purpose is production of fuelwood and charcoal.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FORESTRY
Clarifications: Including artificial regeneration, genetic improvement, production methods, fertilizer, harvesting.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FISHING
Clarifications: Fishing sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; ocean and coastal fishing; marine and freshwater fish surveys and prospecting; fishing boats/equipment; unspecified fishing activities.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FISHING
Clarifications: Exploitation and utilisation of fisheries; fish stock protection; aquaculture; integrated fishery projects.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FISHING
Clarifications: Pilot fish culture; marine/freshwater biological research.

dac2.Name: AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, & FISHING
dac.Name: FISHING
Clarifications: Fishing harbours; fish markets; fishery transport and cold storage.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Industrial sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified industrial activities; manufacturing of goods not specified below.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Direct support to the development of small and medium-sized enterprises in the industrial sector, including accounting, auditing and advisory services.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Staple food processing, dairy products, slaughter houses and equipment, meat and fish processing and preserving, oils/fats, sugar refineries, beverages/tobacco, animal feeds production.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Wood production, pulp/paper production.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Including knitting factories.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Industrial and non-industrial production facilities; includes pesticides production.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Including gas liquefaction; petroleum refineries.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Medical equipment/supplies; drugs, medicines, vaccines; hygienic products.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Iron and steel, structural metal production.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Manufacturing of electrical and non-electrical machinery, engines/turbines.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Shipbuilding, fishing boats building; railroad equipment; motor vehicles and motor passenger cars; aircraft; navigation/guidance systems.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: INDUSTRY
Clarifications: Including industrial standards; quality management; metrology; testing; accreditation; certification.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Mineral and mining sector policy, planning and programmes; mining legislation, mining cadastre, mineral resources inventory, information systems, institution capacity building and advice; unspecified mineral resources exploitation.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Geology, geophysics, geochemistry; excluding hydrogeology (14010) and environmental geology (41010), mineral extraction and processing, infrastructure, technology, economics, safety and environment management.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Including lignite and peat.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Petroleum, natural gas, condensates, liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), liquefied natural gas (LNG); including drilling and production, and oil and gas pipelines.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Iron and ferro-alloy metals.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Aluminium, copper, lead, nickel, tin, zinc.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, gemstones.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Baryte, limestone, feldspar, kaolin, sand, gypsym, gravel, ornamental stones.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Phosphates, potash.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: MINERAL RESOURCES AND MINING
Clarifications: Polymetallic nodules, phosphorites, marine placer deposits.

dac2.Name: INDUSTRY, MINING, & CONSTRUCTION
dac.Name: CONSTRUCTION
Clarifications: Construction sector policy and planning; excluding construction activities within specific sectors (e.g., hospital or school construction).

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
description: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
Clarifications: Trade policy and planning; support to ministries and departments responsible for trade policy; trade-related legislation and regulatory reforms; policy analysis and implementation of multilateral trade agreements e.g. technical barriers to trade and sanitary and phytosanitary measures (TBT/SPS) except at regional level (see 33130); mainstreaming trade in national development strategies (e.g. poverty reduction strategy papers); wholesale/retail trade; unspecified trade and trade promotion activities.

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
Clarifications: Simplification and harmonisation of international import and export procedures (e.g. customs valuation, licensing procedures, transport formalities, payments, insurance); support to customs departments  and other border agencies, including in particular implementation of the provisions of the WTO Trade Facilitation Agreement; tariff reforms.

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
Clarifications: Support to regional trade arrangements [e.g. Southern African Development Community (SADC), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Free Trade Area of the Americas (FTAA), African Caribbean Pacific/European Union (ACP/EU)], including work on technical barriers to trade and sanitary and phytosanitary measures (TBT/SPS) at regional level; elaboration of rules of origin and introduction of special and differential treatment in RTAs.

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
Clarifications: Support developing countries’ effective participation in multilateral trade negotiations, including training of negotiators, assessing impacts of negotiations; accession to the World Trade Organisation (WTO) and other multilateral trade-related organisations.

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
Clarifications: Contributions to the government budget to assist the implementation of recipients’ own trade reforms and adjustments to trade policy measures by other countries; assistance to manage shortfalls in the balance of payments due to changes in the world trading environment.

dac2.Name: TRADE & TOURISM
dac.Name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE- RELATED ADJUSTMENT
Clarifications: Human resources development in trade not included under any of the above codes. Includes university programmes in trade.

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Covers activities concerned with conservation, protection or amelioration of the physical environment without sector allocation.

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Environmental policy, laws, regulations and economic instruments; administrational institutions and practices; environmental and land use planning and decision-making procedures; seminars, meetings; miscellaneous conservation and protection measures not specified below.

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Air pollution control, ozone layer preservation; marine pollution control.

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Including natural reserves and actions in the surrounding areas; other measures to protect endangered or vulnerable species and their habitats (e.g. wetlands preservation).

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Applies to unique cultural landscape; including sites/objects of historical, archeological, aesthetic, scientific or educational value.

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Floods from rivers or the sea; including sea water intrusion control and sea level rise related activities.

dac2.Name: General environmental protection
dac.Name: General environmental protection
Clarifications: Including establishment of databases, inventories/accounts of physical and natural resources; environmental profiles and impact studies if not sector specific.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Integrated urban development projects; local development and urban management; urban infrastructure and services; municipal finances; urban environmental management; urban development and planning; urban renewal and urban housing; land information systems.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Urban development and planning; urban management, land information systems.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Integrated urban development projects; local development; urban infrastructure and services; municipal finances; urban environment systems; urban renewal and urban housing.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Integrated rural development projects; e.g. regional development planning; promotion of decentralised and multi-sectoral competence for planning, co-ordination and management; implementation of regional development and measures (including natural reserve management); land management; land use planning; land settlement and resettlement activities [excluding resettlement of refugees and internally displaced persons (72010)]; functional integration of rural and urban areas; geographical information systems.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Regional development planning; promotion of decentralised and multi-sectoral competence for planning, co-ordination and management; land management; land use planning; geographical information systems.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Integrated rural development projects; implementation of regional development and measures (including natural reserve management); land settlement and resettlement activities [excluding resettlement of refugees and internally displaced persons (72010)]; functional integration of rural and urban areas.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Projects to reduce illicit drug cultivation through, for example, non-agricultural income opportunities, social and physical infrastructure (see code 31165 for agricultural alternative development).

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: Including scholarships.

dac2.Name: Other multisector
dac.Name: Other multisector
Clarifications: When sector cannot be identified.

dac2.Name: General budget support
dac.Name: General budget support
Clarifications: Budget support in the form of sector-wide approaches (SWAps) should be included in the respective sectors.

dac2.Name: General budget support
dac.Name: General budget support
Clarifications: Unearmarked contributions to the government budget; support for the implementation of macroeconomic reforms (structural adjustment programmes, poverty reduction strategies); general programme assistance (when not allocable by sector).

dac2.Name: Developmental food aid/Food security assistance
dac.Name: Developmental food aid/Food security assistance
Clarifications:
Supply of edible human food under national or international programmes including transport costs; cash payments made for food supplies; project food aid and food aid for market sales when benefiting sector not specified; excluding emergency food aid.
Report as multilateral: i) food aid by the EU financed out of its budget and allocated pro rata to EU member countries; and ii) core contributions to the World Food Programme.

dac2.Name: Other commodity assistance
dac.Name: Other commodity assistance
Clarifications: Non-food commodity assistance (when benefiting sector not specified).

dac2.Name: Other commodity assistance
dac.Name: Other commodity assistance
Clarifications: Capital goods and services; lines of credit.

dac2.Name: Other commodity assistance
dac.Name: Other commodity assistance
Clarifications: Commodities, general goods and services, oil imports.

dac2.Name: Debt relief
dac.Name: Debt relief
Clarifications: Actions falling outside the code headings below.

dac2.Name: Debt relief
dac.Name: Debt relief
Clarifications: Grants or credits to cover debt owed to multilateral financial institutions; including contributions to Heavily Indebted Poor Countries (HIPC) Trust Fund.

dac2.Name: Debt relief
dac.Name: Debt relief
Clarifications: Allocation of debt claims to use for development (e.g., debt for education, debt for environment).

dac2.Name: Debt relief
dac.Name: Debt relief
Clarifications: Where the debt swap benefits an external agent i.e. is not specifically for development purposes.

dac2.Name: Debt relief
dac.Name: Debt relief
Clarifications: Purchase of debt for the purpose of cancellation.

dac2.Name: Emergency Response
dac.Name: Emergency Response
Clarifications: An emergency is a situation which results from man made crises and/or natural disasters.

dac2.Name: Emergency Response
dac.Name: Emergency Response
Clarifications: Shelter, water, sanitation and health services, supply of medicines and other non-food relief items for the benefit of affected people and to facilitate the return to normal lives and livelihoods; assistance to refugees and internally displaced people in developing countries other than for food (72040) or protection (72050).

dac2.Name: Emergency Response
dac.Name: Emergency Response
Clarifications: Food aid normally for general free distribution or special supplementary feeding programmes; short-term relief to targeted population groups affected by emergency situations. Excludes non-emergency food security assistance programmes/food aid (52010).

dac2.Name: Emergency Response
dac.Name: Emergency Response
description: Relief co-ordination; protection and support services
Clarifications: Measures to co-ordinate delivery of humanitarian aid, including logistics and communications systems; measures to promote and protect the safety, well- being, dignity and integrity of civilians and those no longer taking part in hostilities. (Activities designed to protect the security of persons or property through the use or display of force are not reportable as ODA.)

dac2.Name: Reconstruction relief and rehabilitation
dac.Name: Reconstruction relief and rehabilitation
Clarifications: This relates to activities during and in the aftermath of an emergency situation. Longer-term activities to improve the level of infrastructure or social services should be reported under the relevant economic and social sector codes. See also guideline on distinguishing humanitarian from sector- allocable aid.

dac2.Name: Reconstruction relief and rehabilitation
dac.Name: Reconstruction relief and rehabilitation
Clarifications: Short-term reconstruction work after emergency or conflict limited to restoring pre-existing infrastructure (e.g. repair or construction of roads, bridges and ports, restoration of essential facilities, such as water and sanitation, shelter, health care services); social and economic rehabilitation in the aftermath of emergencies to facilitate transition and enable populations to return to their previous livelihood or develop a new livelihood in the wake of an emergency situation (e.g. trauma counselling and treatment, employment programmes).

dac2.Name: Disaster prevention and preparedness
dac.Name: Disaster prevention and preparedness
Clarifications: See codes 41050 and 15220 for prevention of floods and conflicts.

dac2.Name: Disaster prevention and preparedness
dac.Name: Disaster prevention and preparedness
Clarifications: Disaster risk reduction activities (e.g. developing knowledge, natural risks cartography, legal norms for construction); early warning systems; emergency contingency stocks and contingency planning including preparations for forced displacement.

dac2.Name: UNALLOCATED/  UNSPECIFIED
dac.Name: UNALLOCATED/  UNSPECIFIED
Clarifications: Contributions to general development of the recipient should be included under programme assistance (51010).

dac2.Name: UNALLOCATED/  UNSPECIFIED
dac.Name: UNALLOCATED/  UNSPECIFIED
Clarifications: Spending in donor country for heightened awareness/interest in development co-operation (brochures, lectures, special research projects, etc.).
